Gloss: “to go out to meet a person on his way”
“to be inverted, to be upside down”
“span of the thumb and first finger”
“to be in excess, to remain, to be left over”
“to tease, to torment, to scold, to hunt”
“to be late (at night), to come late, to be slow”
“to hold a festival, to perform memorial duties”
“to expel, to drive out, to throw out”
“to break or split (it) in two or pieces”
“to be cooked, to be done, to be roasted”
“to bud, to put forth buds or shoots”
“to be accompanied by, to bring some-body”
“to shoot (from the bow), to hit (the mark)”
“to go out, to die out (of a fire)”
